metadata.title: CVE-2024-32491 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Znuny and Znuny LTS 6.0.31 through 6.5.7 andZnuny 7.0.1 through 7.0.16 where a logged-in user can upload a file (via amanipulated AJAX Request) to an arbitrary writable location by traversingpaths. Arbitrary code can be executed if this location is publiclyavailable through the web server.

criterions.comment: znuny package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
